note:
I tend to post about gardening, gaming (both tabletop roleplaying games and online games) and learning the saxophone. Sometimes some mental health, work stuff, or U.S. Politics creeps in there. I try to use CWs for the things I think will cause distress.

(I am not quite as new as I may look; if you think we've run across one another before, it may have been on my old server, toot.site. I joined toot.cat January 7th, 2024, after having been on toot.site since November 4th, 2022).

fields.name: Just My Toots
fields.value: https://justmytoots.com/@AngelaPreston@toot.cat
